clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Testes are unremarkable with normal vascularity.
Breast tissue shows ill-defined lesion measuring 2.67 mm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates hypoechoic without fluid collection.
Thyroid gland shows unremarkable echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Common bile duct measures 35.66 mm, within normal limits.
Right kidney demonstrates mildly heterogeneous, no hydronephrosis.
Uterus appears unremarkable; endometrial thickness measures 23.11 mm.
